memories.summary: On January 4, 2025, in Denver, Jack hiked through a snowy forest trail, his breath visible in the cold air as he stopped to take photos of pine trees.
On February 16, 2025, in Sedona, Jack climbed red rock formations with his friend Maya, pausing at the top to watch the sunset.
On March 20, 2025, in Yosemite National Park, Jack camped with his cousin Ethan, roasting marshmallows beside a glowing campfire.
On April 10, 2025, in Zion National Park, Jack hiked The Narrows, wading through shallow water surrounded by towering canyon walls.
On May 18, 2025, in Grand Canyon Village, Jack took a panoramic photo from the South Rim with his parents smiling beside him.
On June 22, 2025, in Seattle, Jack went kayaking on Lake Union with his friend Daniel, paddling beneath the city skyline.
On July 25, 2025, in Banff National Park, Jack stood near a turquoise lake, his reflection mirrored on the calm water.
On September 7, 2025, in Glacier National Park, Jack joined a hiking group, trekking along a mountain ridge under clear blue skies.
On October 15, 2025, in Acadia National Park, Jack biked through autumn-colored trails, leaves scattering beneath his tires.
On December 5, 2025, in Denver, Jack sat beside a campfire in his backyard, sipping cocoa while reviewing photos from his year of travels.

qa_pairs.question: Which regions did Jack explore across 2025, and what activities did he do there?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: He hiked in Colorado and Utah, climbed rocks in Arizona, camped in California, kayaked in Washington, biked in Maine, and hiked in Canada and Montana.

qa_pairs.question: Which memories show Jack traveling with others, and who were they?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: With Maya in Sedona and Glacier, Ethan in Yosemite and Glacier, Daniel in Seattle, and his parents at the Grand Canyon.

qa_pairs.question: Which outdoor activities involved water?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: Kayaking on Lake Union, hiking The Narrows in Zion, and camping near rivers in Yosemite.

qa_pairs.question: What shows Jack's shift from adventure to reflection through the year?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: He began with challenging hikes and climbs, then ended the year quietly by his backyard campfire reflecting on his travels.

qa_pairs.question: Which memory best captures natural beauty, and what details emphasize it?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: The Banff hike, where his reflection appeared in the turquoise lake under calm weather.
